schema.description:
初始化配置类型，可选以下值：
 - `HighAvailability`：高可用，该配置会将实例数设置为2，同时启用公网SLB
 - `StandAlone`：低成本，该配置会将实例数设置为1

Message.description: 响应消息，若成功请求为success

OptionDescription.example: The reverse proxy type used. After the reverse proxy starts, it will listen to the instance's port 80. Make sure that the port is not occupied by other programs. The reverse proxy will forward the received HTTP request to the application's service port.

Code.description: 响应代码，若成功请求为OK

The forwarding rule is in the format of Host / Path, and Host or Path needs to configure at least one item, such as www.taobao.com/test, www.taobao.com, /test are all correct forwarding rules. 1 Integer {"component":"NumberPicker","props":{}} 80 65535 resources.slb.intranet backendPort Intranet SLB Backend Port NoInterruption true -1 true 0 The intranet SLB forwards the request to the port of the instance, which is generally the application reverse proxy port -1 Integer {"component":"NumberPicker","props":{}} -1 5120 resources.slb.intranet bandwidth Max Bandwidth NoInterruption false -1 true 0 The peak bandwidth of the load balancer. -1 String {"component":"Select","props":{}} slb.s1.small -1 resources.slb.intranet loadBalancerSpec Load Balancer Spec NoInterruption false 32 ["slb.s1.small","slb.s2.small","slb.s2.medium","slb.s3.small","slb.s3.medium","slb.s3.large"] true 0 The specifications of the load balancing instance. -1 String {"component":"Input","props":{}} / -1 resources.slb.intranet healthCheckUrl 健康检查URL NoInterruption false 256 true 0 用于健康检查的URL路径。 -1 String {"component":"Select","props":{}} paybytraffic -1 resources.slb.intranet internetChargeType Charge Type NoInterruption false 32 ["paybybandwidth","paybytraffic"] true 0 The payment method of the SLB instance can be charged by bandwidth or by flow meter. Intranet SLB resources.slb.intranet false -1 Boolean {"component":"Switch","props":{}} false -1 resources.rds enable Enable NoInterruption false -1 false 0 The Aliyun Relational Database Service is a stable, resilient, scalable online database service that supports MySQL, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, PPAS, and MariaDB TX engines. It also provides a complete solution for disaster tolerance, backup, recovery, monitoring, migration, and more. For more information, please refer toWhat is Cloud Database RDS。 -1 Boolean {"component":"Switch","props":{}} false -1 resources.rds imported Use existed instance NoInterruption false -1 false 0 Please import an existing RDS instance. Under this scenario, you need to ensure that the corresponding database, account and password exist on the instance. And Web+ will send the provided connection information to the application. -1 String {"component":"RDSSelector","props":{}} -1 resources.rds rdsId Database Instance NoInterruption false 32 false 0 Please select the database instance you want to import -1 String {"component":"RDSZoneSelector","props":{}} -1 resources.rds zoneId Zone NoInterruption false 64 false 0 Please select the available zone where the RDS instance is located -1 JSON {"component":"RDSVSwitchSelector","props":{}} [] -1 resources.rds vSwitches Zone and VSwitch NoInterruption false 1024 false 0 Please select the zone and switch where the RDS instance is located (the star-marked switch is the default switch for the current environment) -1 String {"component":"RDSEngineSelector","props":{}} -1 resources.rds engine Database Type NoInterruption false 32 false 0 RDS supports database types such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server, MariaDB TX, and PPAS (Postgre Plus Advanced Server, highly compatible Oracle Database). -1 String {"component":"RDSEngineVersionSelector","props":{}} -1 resources.rds engineVersion Database version NoInterruption false 32 false 0 Choose the right database engine version for your business needs -1 String {"component":"RDSStorageTypeSelector","props":{}} -1 resources.rds storageType Storage Type NoInterruption false 32 false 0 To meet the needs of different scenarios, cloud database RDS offers three types of data storage: local_ssd , cloud_ssd, and cloud_essd. It is recommended to use the local SSD disk to store data on the local SSD disk, which can reduce I/O latency. Detail can be referenced here Storage type。 5 Integer {"component":"RDSStorageSizeSelector","props":{}} 100 10000 resources.rds storageSize Storage size NoInterruption false -1 false 0 Choose the right storage size for your business needs (in GB) -1 String {"component":"RDSInstanceClassSelector","props":{}} -1 resources.rds dbInstanceClass Instance Class NoInterruption false 32 false 0 Cloud database RDS offers two instance size families, both generic and exclusive. Generic instance has universal exclusive allocated memory and I/O resources but share CPU and storage resources with other generic instances on the same physical machine. Exclusive instance has exclusive cpu, memory, storage, and I/O resources and performance that is not affected by the behavior of other instances on the physical machine.See in detailInstance Specification Family。 -1 String {"component":"Input","props":{}} webplus -1 resources.rds databaseName Database Name NoInterruption false 64 false 0 The name of the database. Under purchasing scenario, Web+ will help you create the database (except PostgreSQL, PPAS, and SQL Server 2017 Cluster Edition, which you can do with CREATE DATABASE in SQL), and under the import scenario you need to ensure that the database already exists. -1 String {"component":"RDSCharacterSetSelector","props":{}} -1 resources.rds characterSetName Character Set NoInterruption false 64 false 0 The character set of the database, MySQL and MariaDB by default takes utf8mb4, SQL Server by default takes Chinese-PRC-CI-AS -1 String {"component":"Input","props":{}} webplus -1 resources.rds accountName Account Name NoInterruption false 32 false 0 The database account. Under the purchasing scenario, Web+ will help you create and maintain this account on the instance, and under the import scenario you need to ensure that the account is correct. -1 String {"component":"RDSAccountPassword","props":{}} -1 resources.rds accountPassword Password NoInterruption false 1024 false 0 The password of the database account. Under the purchasing scenario, Web+ will ensure that the account is consistent with the password, and under the import scene you need to ensure that the password is correct.(Password rule is: uppercase, lowercase, number, special characters accounted for three, length 8-32 bits, special characters for -1 String {"component":"RDSCategorySelector","props":{}} -1 resources.rds category Category NoInterruption false 1024 false 0 Cloud database RDS include four series: Basic, High Available, Cluster, and Financial. Details can be found hereOverview of the product line。 Cloud Database RDS resources.rds application Application false 1024 Integer {"component":"NumberPicker","props":{}} 8080 65535 application.option port Server Port NoInterruption false -1 false 0 This port will be used as the HTTP service port after the application is launched, and ports from 1024 to 65535 can be used. 0 Integer {"component":"NumberPicker","props":{}} 180 180 application.option maxStartDuration Application Max Start Duration (Seconds) NoInterruption false -1 true 0 If the health check status is still incorrect during this time after the application is started, the application is considered to have failed to start. General application.option false -1 String {"component":"Select","props":{}} http -1 application.healthCheck type Health Check Type NoInterruption false 16 [{"value": "http", "label": "HTTP"},{"value": "tcp", "label": "TCP"}] false 0 The type of protocol used by the health check, currently supporting TCP and HTTP, Web+ will periodically send health check requests to the application's service port to determine if the application is healthy. -1 String {"component":"Input","props":{}} / -1 application.healthCheck path Health Check URL NoInterruption false 256 false 0 Web+ will request this URL and judge whether the application is healthy according to the response code. If a non-20x/30x response code is received or the response times out, it is determined that the single health check failed. 1 Integer {"component":"NumberPicker","props":{}} 3 30 application.healthCheck retryCount Health Check Retry Count NoInterruption false -1 false 0 If the health check retry exceeds this number, it is determined that the health check failed. 1 Integer {"component":"NumberPicker","props":{}} 3 60 application.healthCheck intervalSeconds Health Check Interval (Seconds) NoInterruption false -1 false 0 When an inspection fails, the interval to the next health check is long. 1 Integer {"component":"NumberPicker","props":{}} 3 60 application.healthCheck timeoutSeconds Health Check Timeout (Seconds) NoInterruption false -1 false 0 The timeout period for a single health check. Health Check application.healthCheck true -1 String {"component":"Editor","props":{}} -1 application.commands start Start Command NoInterruption false 1024 false 0 Web+ uses this command to launch an application -1 String {"component":"Editor","props":{}} -1 application.commands stop Stop Command NoInterruption false 1024 false 0 Web+ uses this command to stop the application Commands application.commands true -1 String {"component":"Editor","props":{}} -1 hooks prestart PreStart NoInterruption false 1024 false 0 Web+ will call this command before the app starts -1 String {"component":"Editor","props":{}} -1 hooks poststart PostStart NoInterruption false 1024 false 0 Web+ will call this command after the app launches -1 String {"component":"Editor","props":{}} -1 hooks prestop PreStop NoInterruption false 1024 false 0 Web+ will call this command before the application stops -1 String {"component":"Editor","props":{}} -1 hooks poststop PostStop NoInterruption false 1024 false 0 Web+ will call this command after the app has stopped -1 String {"component":"Editor","props":{}} -1 hooks postinit Postinit NoInterruption false 1024 false 0 Web+ will call this command when the application is initialized Hooks hooks false -1 JSON {"component":"KVListEditor","props":{}} [] -1 application.environmentVariables value Environmental Variables NoInterruption false 16384 false 0 The environment variable used to launch the app. Startup options application.environmentVariables false -1 String {"component":"TextArea","props":{}} -1 application.jvmOpts value JVM Options NoInterruption false 16384 false 0 Set the Java virtual machine parameters used to launch the application. JVM application.jvmOpts true -1 String {"component":"FileUploader","props":{}} -1 application.tomcatServerXml serverConfig Tomcat Configuration File NoInterruption false 256 false 0 Use this file to replace Tomcat's server.xml configuration Tomcat Configuration application.tomcatServerXml true -1 String ^[A-Za-z0-9_\-.]{1,64}$ {"component":"Input","props":{}} -1 application.package label Package Label NoInterruption false 64 true 0 Web+ will use this version of the deployment package to deploy ECS instances. -1 String {"component":"Input","props":{}} -1 application.package storageKey Package File Name NoInterruption false 256 true 0 Web+ will deploy this file to the ECS instance. -1 String {"component":"Input","props":{}} -1 application.package url Package URL NoInterruption false 1024 true 0 Configure the URL of package. webx.configindex.path.application.application-package.msg application.package Tomcat 8.5 / Java 8 / Aliyun Linux 2.1903 ","errorExample":""}]
